about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for Shalnor Legends: Sacred Lands. Composed by Johnny Ostad. Featuring 24 tracks, each track is ~2 minutes long. An exact total of 49 minutes and 45 seconds. All tracks are in .mp3 format and 128kbps.


TRACKLIST

01 - By the Heartfire
02 - The Sacred Trial
03 - Meadows of Illeria
04 - Night Garden
05 - Old Man Brode
06 - Endless Caverns
07 - Hot Dry Sand
08 - Cloudless Sky
09 - My Dear Albia
10 - Sandstone Temple
11 - Bells of Azure
12 - The Blue Moon
13 - An Orc Named Borg
14 - Deepmire Hollow
15 - Valley of Grief
16 - Spirit Presence
17 - Crystal Mines
18 - Into the Deeps
19 - The Murky Wilds
20 - Fisherman's Shack
21 - Tikkie Tower
22 - Undergrove
23 - Fight or Die
24 - Sweet Victory
